params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: select `team_channels`.`channel_view_name`, `team_channels`.`team_channel_id`, `team_channels`.`id` from `team_channels` left join `team_channel_users` on `team_channel_users`.`team_channel_name_id` = `team_channels`.`id` where `team_channel_users`.`user_id` = '1'
select `users`.`first_name`, `users`.`id` from `users` left join `team_channel_users` on `team_channel_users`.`user_id` = `users`.`id` where `team_channel_users`.`team_channel_name_id` = '1'
select `users`.`first_name`, `users`.`id` from `users` left join `team_channel_users` on `team_channel_users`.`user_id` = `users`.`id` where `team_channel_users`.`team_channel_name_id` = '3'
